Job Title: Global Key Account Director

Location: San Francisco Bay Area

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Sales, Strategy/Planning

Description:
Hexagon's Manufacturing Intelligence division is seeking a Global Key Account Director in the San Francisco Bay area. 
***The ideal candidate must be fluent in Chinese/Mandarin and English.
***This is a fully remote position day to day, although the ideal candidate will be able to travel to the location of this key account 2-3 times per month.
At Hexagon, we strive to help industrial manufacturers develop the disruptive technologies of today and the life-changing products of tomorrow. Our strength comes from our global footprint and enormous portfolio of advanced industrial sensors, measurement technologies, factory automation, simulation, and analytics tools.
Description:The Global Key Account Director is responsible for the growth and success of Hexagon Manufacturing Intelligence with this hallmark account and will deliver the short and long-term account objectives and strategies, define and drive business targets and puts them into execution.
Responsibilities:Responsible to grow the global sales and profitability of the account working closely with regional account teamsUnderstand customer spending, investment plans, roadmaps and to drive new business growthDemonstrative experience of thinking globally and acting locallyBuild and maintain relationships at executive and working levels in the customer organization primarily in the headquarters but also support the global staff to proactively build relationships in international and production locations to drive business growthAssist global staff in work and design procedures to generate profitable sales in both existing and new marketsPromote Hexagon’s whole portfolio and its value to the customer, including our Smart Manufacturing solutionsEnsure global cooperation on projects within Hexagon both regionally and through different departments such as Product, Manufacturing, Applications, Sales, Finance, etc.Resolve operational issues by responding with speed and effectiveness while also building out processes and best practices to minimize the operational issues.Collaborate to identify customer requirements, quote, negotiate and close business on behalf of Hexagon MIBuilding and promoting standardized pricing globally with local team support to overall account profitability.Travel internationally when required for high level customer meetings
Qualifications: 6+ years of experience as a senior leader in revenue generating function e.g., Key account, strategic sales, business development, and solution sellingExperience in software and hardware solutions in the design, engineering, production, and inspection/metrology either selling them or using themExperience working in Consumer electronics and preferably also Contract manufacturingSignificant experience operating in complex, multi-national and multi-faceted (e.g., matrix) environments with multiple stakeholdersExperience in managing multinational supply chains footprint for OEM client ensuring maximum coverage of Hexagon MI capabilitiesSuccessful building, managing and development of virtual expert teams in a multinational environmentExcellent analytical and problem-solving ability to understand business stakeholder needs, drive prioritization, and deliver outcomesFluent communicator both in English and preferably Mandarin; able to present complex ideas clearly and engagingly at all business levels including customer, management, sales and technicalAdept at inspiring behavior change through motivating teams, planning initiatives, designating priorities, and being decisive when faced with ambiguity
At Hexagon Manufacturing Intelligence, our spirited energy and engagement are evident in our commitment to our work, passion for what we do and the speed by which we achieve it. Here you will find the opportunity to build your career, develop professionally, and explore opportunities across a large, diversified company that prides itself on its innovative spirit and commitment to integrity.
We strive to attract the most talented and dynamic individuals in their fields because our success is in our people! Our culture encourages independent thinking and a team mentality. And we offer a competitive benefits package that's second to none.
Exceptional medical, dental, vision insurancesFlexible Spending Accounts (FSA)401k with employer matchGenerous Paid Time Off (PTO)Tuition ReimbursementTraining Opportunities 
Hexagon Metrology, Inc. is an Equal Opportunity Employer ► M / F / Vet / Disability ► E-Verify Participant

Experience Level (if available): Director
